19  package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.handler;
20  
21  import java.io.IOException;
22  import java.io.InterruptedIOException;
23  import java.util.ArrayList;
24  import java.util.Arrays;
25  import java.util.List;
26  import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
27  import java.util.concurrent.CompletionService;
28  import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
29  import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorCompletionService;
30  import java.util.concurrent.Future;
31  import java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory;
32  import java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor;
33  import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;

35  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
36  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
37  import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;
38  import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
39  import org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem;
40  import org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path;
41  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseFileSystem;
42  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo;
43  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor;
44  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.NotAllMetaRegionsOnlineException;
45  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Server;
46  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ServerName;
47  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableExistsException;
48  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.CatalogTracker;
49  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.MetaEditor;
50  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.MetaReader;
51  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.executor.EventHandler;
52  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.AssignmentManager;
53  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.MasterFileSystem;
54  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.ServerManager;
55  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegion;
56  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.FSTableDescriptors;
57  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.ModifyRegionUtils;
58  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Threads;
59  import org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException;
60  
61  /**
62   * Handler to create a table.
63   */
64  @InterfaceAudience.Private
65  public class CreateTableHandler extends EventHandler {
66    private static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(CreateTableHandler.class);
67    protected MasterFileSystem fileSystemManager;
68    protected final HTableDescriptor hTableDescriptor;
69    protected Configuration conf;
70    protected final AssignmentManager assignmentManager;
71    protected final CatalogTracker catalogTracker;
72    protected final ServerManager serverManager;
73    private final HRegionInfo [] newRegions;
74  
75    public CreateTableHandler(Server server, MasterFileSystem fileSystemManager,
76      ServerManager serverManager, HTableDescriptor hTableDescriptor,
77      Configuration conf, HRegionInfo [] newRegions,
78      CatalogTracker catalogTracker, AssignmentManager assignmentManager)
79      throws NotAllMetaRegionsOnlineException, TableExistsException,
80      IOException {
81      super(server, EventType.C_M_CREATE_TABLE);
82  
83      this.fileSystemManager = fileSystemManager;
84      this.serverManager = serverManager;
85      this.hTableDescriptor = hTableDescriptor;
86      this.conf = conf;
87      this.newRegions = newRegions;
88      this.catalogTracker = catalogTracker;
89      this.assignmentManager = assignmentManager;
90  
91      int timeout = conf.getInt("hbase.client.catalog.timeout", 10000);
92      // Need META availability to create a table
93      try {
94        if(catalogTracker.waitForMeta(timeout) == null) {
95          throw new NotAllMetaRegionsOnlineException();
96        }
97      } catch (InterruptedException e) {
98        LOG.warn("Interrupted waiting for meta availability", e);
99        throw new IOException(e);
100     }
101 
102     String tableName = this.hTableDescriptor.getNameAsString();
103     if (MetaReader.tableExists(catalogTracker, tableName)) {
104       throw new TableExistsException(tableName);
105     }
106 
107     // If we have multiple client threads trying to create the table at the
108     // same time, given the async nature of the operation, the table
109     // could be in a state where .META. table hasn't been updated yet in
110     // the process() function.
111     // Use enabling state to tell if there is already a request for the same
112     // table in progress. This will introduce a new zookeeper call. Given
113     // createTable isn't a frequent operation, that should be ok.
114     try {
115       if (!this.assignmentManager.getZKTable().checkAndSetEnablingTable(tableName))
116         throw new TableExistsException(tableName);
117     } catch (KeeperException e) {
118       throw new IOException("Unable to ensure that the table will be" +
119         " enabling because of a ZooKeeper issue", e);
120     }
121   }
122 
123 
124   @Override
125   public String toString() {
126     String name = "UnknownServerName";
127     if(server != null && server.getServerName() != null) {
128       name = server.getServerName().toString();
129     }
130     return getClass().getSimpleName() + "-" + name + "-" + getSeqid() + "-" +
131       this.hTableDescriptor.getNameAsString();
132   }
133 
134   @Override
135   public void process() {
136     String tableName = this.hTableDescriptor.getNameAsString();
137     try {
138       LOG.info("Attempting to create the table " + tableName);
139       handleCreateTable(tableName);
140       completed(null);
141     } catch (Throwable e) {
142       LOG.error("Error trying to create the table " + tableName, e);
143       completed(e);
144     }
145   }
146 
147   /**
148    * Called after that process() is completed.
149    * @param exception null if process() is successful or not null if something has failed.
150    */
151   protected void completed(final Throwable exception) {
152   }
153 
154   /**
155    * Responsible of table creation (on-disk and META) and assignment.
156    * - Create the table directory and descriptor (temp folder)
157    * - Create the on-disk regions (temp folder)
158    *   [If something fails here: we've just some trash in temp]
159    * - Move the table from temp to the root directory
160    *   [If something fails here: we've the table in place but some of the rows required
161    *    present in META. (hbck needed)]
162    * - Add regions to META
163    *   [If something fails here: we don't have regions assigned: table disabled]
164    * - Assign regions to Region Servers
165    *   [If something fails here: we still have the table in disabled state]
166    * - Update ZooKeeper with the enabled state
167    */
168   private void handleCreateTable(String tableName) throws IOException, KeeperException {
169     Path tempdir = fileSystemManager.getTempDir();
170     FileSystem fs = fileSystemManager.getFileSystem();
171 
172     // 1. Create Table Descriptor
173     FSTableDescriptors.createTableDescriptor(fs, tempdir, this.hTableDescriptor);
174     Path tempTableDir = new Path(tempdir, tableName);
175     Path tableDir = new Path(fileSystemManager.getRootDir(), tableName);
176 
177     // 2. Create Regions
178     List<HRegionInfo> regionInfos = handleCreateHdfsRegions(tempdir, tableName);
179 
180     // 3. Move Table temp directory to the hbase root location
181     if (!HBaseFileSystem.renameDirForFileSystem(fs, tempTableDir, tableDir)) {
182       throw new IOException("Unable to move table from temp=" + tempTableDir +
183         " to hbase root=" + tableDir);
184     }
185 
186     if (regionInfos != null && regionInfos.size() > 0) {
187       // 4. Add regions to META
188       MetaEditor.addRegionsToMeta(this.catalogTracker, regionInfos);
189 
190       // 5. Trigger immediate assignment of the regions in round-robin fashion
191       List<ServerName> servers = serverManager.getOnlineServersList();
192       // Remove the deadNotExpired servers from the server list.
193       assignmentManager.removeDeadNotExpiredServers(servers);
194       try {
195         this.assignmentManager.assignUserRegions(regionInfos, servers);
196       } catch (InterruptedException e) {
197         LOG.error("Caught " + e + " during round-robin assignment");
198         InterruptedIOException ie = new InterruptedIOException(e.getMessage());
199         ie.initCause(e);
200         throw ie;
201       }
202     }
203 
204     // 6. Set table enabled flag up in zk.
205     try {
206       assignmentManager.getZKTable().setEnabledTable(tableName);
207     } catch (KeeperException e) {
208       throw new IOException("Unable to ensure that " + tableName + " will be" +
209         " enabled because of a ZooKeeper issue", e);
210     }
211   }
212 
213   /**
214    * Create the on-disk structure for the table, and returns the regions info.
215    * @param tableRootDir directory where the table is being created
216    * @param tableName name of the table under construction
217    * @return the list of regions created
218    */
219   protected List<HRegionInfo> handleCreateHdfsRegions(final Path tableRootDir,
220     final String tableName)
221       throws IOException {
222     return ModifyRegionUtils.createRegions(conf, tableRootDir,
223         hTableDescriptor, newRegions, null);
224   }
225 }
